literals: 'âœ… All predictions have been saved successfully into predictions.db'
comments: Set the path to your predictions folder
Change this if your folder name is different
1. Connect to (or create) a SQLite database file
This file will be created in your current directory
2. Create a table if it does not exist already
3. Loop through all .txt files inside the predictions folder
Make sure there are enough parts in the line
docstrings:
'''
    CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS detections (
        id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
        frame_name TEXT,
        class_name TEXT,
        x1 REAL,
        y1 REAL,
        x2 REAL,
        y2 REAL,
        confidence REAL
    )
'''

'''
                        INSERT INTO detections (frame_name, class_name, x1, y1, x2, y2, confidence)
                        VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
                    '''
